The most crass interpretation came from talk radio host Rush Limbaugh , who wrote the Politico's Jonathan Martin the following: Dick Cheney Colin Powell says his endorsement is not about race... OK, fine. I am now researching his past endorsements to see if I can find all the inexperienced, very liberal, white candidates he has endorsed. I'll let you know what I come up with. Around the same time, esteemed conservative columnist George Will was also explaining Colin Powell 's decision as part of a larger, more psychological sway that Barack Obama held over other African Americans.
